meanings.definition: To lift or move something upwards.
meanings.sent1: She carefully upraised the heavy box onto the shelf.
meanings.sent2: The construction workers upraised the beam to the top floor.
meanings.sent3: The magician upraised the rabbit, making the audience gasp in surprise.
meanings.sent4: His words upraised her spirits like a warm hug on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The sun slowly upraising over the horizon painted the sky in hues of pink and orange.

meanings.sent1: He upraised his hand to ask a question in class.
meanings.sent2: The chef upraised the cake carefully to avoid any accidents.
meanings.sent3: The cat upraised its tail in excitement when it saw its favorite toy.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter upraised the mood of the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The hot air balloon upraising into the sky was a breathtaking sight.

meanings.definition: The act of raising or lifting something up.
meanings.sent1: The upraising of the flag signaled the start of the event.
meanings.sent2: The upraising of the curtain revealed the grand stage.
meanings.sent3: The sudden upraising of prices left customers shocked.
meanings.sent4: The upraising of voices in the choir filled the church with beautiful music.
meanings.sent5: The upraising of the trophy marked their victory in the competition.

meanings.definition: To bring up or nurture something.
meanings.sent1: She upraised her children with love and care.
meanings.sent2: The teacher upraised the students' interest in science with exciting experiments.
meanings.sent3: The gardener upraised the plants, making the garden look vibrant.
meanings.sent4: His mentorship upraised many young talents in the industry.
meanings.sent5: The community upraising awareness about environmental issues.

meanings.definition: A movement or action of raising or lifting up.
meanings.sent1: The upraising of the drawbridge allowed the ship to pass through.
meanings.sent2: The upraising of hands in the crowd showed overwhelming support for the idea.
meanings.sent3: The sudden upraising of the balloon startled the children.
meanings.sent4: The upraising of the stage platform revealed the hidden dancers.
meanings.sent5: The upraising of the flag at the ceremony symbolized unity and pride.
